The Wake Up Live Team Shares Their Secrets

09 Aug 2008

The Wake Up Live team would like to let you in on some of the secrets of how you can achieve fame and fortune as a published author.

Now, with the support of a talented and dedicated staff, Steven E Schmitt and Lee have attracted a best-selling co-author team from around the world to bring inspiration and motivation to millions of readers. In the process, the Wake Up team has developed as amazing Team Publishers program to bring an effective alternative to individuals that want to publish a book. They have developed the # 1 Team Publishers program in the world which is a new method that teaches publishing, publicity and marketing to authors, speakers, consultants, writers, and industry experts.

Wake Up Live Team Publishers is the best publishing alternative in the book industry.

With Wake Up Live Team Publishers, you can submit your story and Wake Up Live Team Publishers does the publishing in record time and then promotes your book to the best seller list making you a best-selling co-author.

If you research self publishing, you will discover that there are many aspects to publishing and distributing a book. It’s complicated. It’s stressful. And 95 percent of the time it doesn’t work.\n \nWhen you explore submitting your manuscript to traditional publishers, you will find that most manuscripts are never read. That is why it makes since to listen to this tele-seminar and get started with our Wake Up Live Team\n \nYou can learn more about how you join the Wake Up Live team and spread your message of hope and inspiration to countries around the world.
